trans-unit.source: Azure Service Management and Azure Resource Manager
trans-unit.target: Azure Service Management and Azure Resource Manager

trans-unit.source: This article is for a resource created in Service Management. Microsoft recommends Resource Manager for new Azure resources. For an explanation of the advantages of Resource Manager, see <link><linkText>Azure Compute, Network & Storage Providers under Azure Resource Manager</linkText><title></title></link>. To do the same task with Resource Manager, see the following article:
